about.title: About Us
about.description: TUIMAADA is an international group of companies and services, including an elite real estate agency in Moscow, USA and the UAE.
about.tagline: We are ready to help you
about.taglineDescription: We are ready to help you in choosing a suitable object. Our agency works both directly with the developer and in the secondary market. TUIMAADA specialists confidently navigate the real estate market in the UAE, know the real prices, features of districts and individual objects.

bestOffer.title: we will find the best offer for you
bestOffer.description:
For many years we have been helping our clients to purchase luxury real estate on the most favorable terms.

It is also possible to purchase an object remotely without leaving the country.

addresses.street: Moscow city, Moscow tower, 8 Presnenskaya quay, building 1, floor 60, office 604
9100 Wilshire Blvd Beverly Hills, CA 90212, Office 720W

hero.title: Our full range of services
hero.description:
Your reliable partner in the world of real estate and business in the United Arab Emirates. 

Our goal is to make your investments and business operations in this country successful and selflessly meet your needs.

processes.title: We take the whole process on ourselves
processes.description: Tuimaada Real Estate Company provides high-quality real estate and business consulting services in the United Arab Emirates. Our experience and expertise allow us to provide a full range of services, including:

items.label: Individual approach
items.description: Assistance in the acquisition and sale of real estate in both the primary and secondary markets of the UAE. We provide an individual approach and professional support at all stages of the transaction.

items.label: Real estate rental
items.description: Our experts will help you find and rent the perfect accommodation or commercial space that meets your needs.

items.label: Registration of resident visas
items.description: Our experts will help you find and rent the perfect accommodation or commercial space that meets your needs.

items.label: Opening of companies
items.description: Our consultants will help you with registration and registration of companies in the UAE, providing the necessary information and advice on choosing the best structure.

items.label: Opening of bank accounts
items.description: We will provide you with all the necessary information and assistance when opening bank accounts in the UAE, providing convenience and transparency of financial transactions.

hero.title: Values of our company
hero.subtitle: Humanity
hero.description: We are attentive to the needs, desires and capabilities of each client. We will individually select the objects and consult for free on all issues. We save time and money for those who contact us.

simplicity.title: Simplicity
simplicity.description:
We will take care of the documents and logistics. You will only need to select an object, sign the documents and get the keys.

We creatively and effectively solve problems in the field of residential, commercial, suburban, investment real estate in the UAE, Russia and USA, relying on the deep long-term expertise of the innovator and leader of the Russian real estate market.
